app_descript:
Team GB

Brief

Team GB is the ultimate companion app for fans looking to support and follow Team Great Britain's Olympic endeavors. Packed with features to keep you updated on the latest happenings, results, and exclusive perks, this app brings the Olympic spirit right to your fingertips. With live medal alerts, an all-embracing event calendar, and special content featuring the nation's athletes, Team GB is your direct line to the heart of the Olympic Games.
